DESCRIPTION: Triggered when the value of the field changes
Triggered when the user clicks the field
Triggered when the field gains focus
Triggered when the field loses focus
Triggered immediately when user types in input field
Triggered when a key is released while focusing on the field
Triggered when a key is pressed down while focusing on the field
Triggered when the form is submitted
Triggered when mouse enters the element area
Triggered when mouse leaves the element area
Triggered when user selects text inside a field
Triggered when user double clicks the field
Triggered when user scrolls within an element
Triggered when user pastes content into the field
Triggered when user copies content from the field
Triggered when user cuts content from the field
